text: "30,000 Pounds of Bananas" is a song by Harry Chapin. It is from his 1974 Verities & Balderdash album. The song tells the story of real-life truck accident which happened on March 18, 1965, in Scranton, Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:1974 songs Category:Scranton, Pennsylvania
title: 30,000 Pounds of Bananas
